SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Card
The Card class encapsulates the essential attributes of a Card in a game of UNO.
Card.Rank
An Enumeration containing all the possible Ranks (face values) an UNO card can have in a game of UNO.
Card.Suit
An Enumeration containing the possible Suits (color) an UNO card can have in a game of UNO.
Game
The Game class encapsulates the essential attributes of a game of UNO.
Game.GameState
Enumeration representing the various game states a game of UNO can be in at any given point in time.
Game.MoveState
Enumeration representing whether a move submitted is valid or not.
GameFragment
A Fragment subclass used to display and manage the application Game screen.
GameService
Manages the different game operations that can happen in a game of UNO.
GameViewModel
ViewModel for managing game state and player operations/actions in the Uno application.
GoogleSignInService
Service for handling Google Sign-In operations.
Hand
The Hand class encapsulates the essential attributes of a Hand in a game of UNO.
HandAdapter
 
HandAdapter.OnCardClickListener
A functional interface for handling card click events.
LoadingFragment
A Fragment subclass used to display and manage a loading view while a game is waiting for more players to join.
LobbyFragment
A Fragment subclass used to display the Lobby "screen" that is displayed when a user is about to join/create a new game of UNO.
LoginActivity
Handles user login.
LoginViewModel
ViewModel class for managing Google Sign-In operations.
MainActivity
Main activity of the application.
MainNavigationMapDirections
 
RankSuitCombo
 
SettingsActivity
Activity for displaying and managing application settings.
SettingsActivityDirections
 
SettingsFragment
A Fragment subclass used to display and manage the application's settings options.
UnoApplication
The UNO Application class which initializes application-wide resources and handles updates to shared preferences related to dark mode settings.
UnoServiceLongProxy
The UnoServiceLongProxy interface defines the API endpoint for interacting with the UNO web game service to long poll for game updates.
UnoServiceModule
Module for providing UnoService dependencies using Hilt.
UnoServiceProxy
The UnoServiceProxy interface defines the API endpoints for interacting with the UNO web game service.
User
The User class encapsulates the essential attributes of a user/player in the UNO application.
UserRepository
Repository class for getting User information in the application.
UsersAdapter
 
UserViewModel
ViewModel class for managing user data.
